short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utilize different ChatGPT language learning features to enhance language learning on Lingq!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LingqChatGPT is an extension that embeds a fine-tuned ChatGPT assistant into Lingq.

Features:
Get Contextual Definition: Instantly uncover meanings with a click. Get contextual, precise defintions when Popular Meanings is not enough

Translate Sentence: Translate sentences on the spot, with one click.

Get Dictionary Definitions: If you are curious of all the meanings of a word, get all the dictionary definitions with one click

Identify Separable Verbs: Tackle complex grammar with ease. Our assistant identifies separable verbs for you, making sense of those tricky constructs in languages like Dutch and German

Identify the Verb Case: If you are stuck on how a verb is being used, get the verb's case (e.g., present, past, etc.) and the verb's infinitive

Identify the Noun Case: If you are uncertain how a noun is being used, identify whether the noun is in the nominative, accusative, genitive, etc case

LingqChatGPT works with all Lingq languages. It is automatically tailored to the language you are learning and the language you are learning in.
